text: Hilkiah, Ahikam, Achbor, Shaphan mo Asaiah guu hula bolo gi iloo mai i baahi di ahina dono ingoo go Huldah, di soukohp dela e noho i lodo di gowaa hoou i Jerusalem. (Di lodo o maa go Shallum, tama daane ni Tikvah, dela go tama daane a Harhas. Shallum e madamada humalia i nia gahu lloo o di Hale Daumaha.) Digaula gu hagi anga gi di ahina deelaa i nia mee ala ne hai.
